PURPOSE: The CustomerMasterService manages all customer-related data and processes, serving as the central repository for customer information, contact details, and business relationships.
It handles core business processes such as customer onboarding, account management, sales and marketing activities, and customer support interactions.

The service maintains critical data assets like customer profiles, contracts, communication history, and purchase records, enabling efficient operations and data-driven decision-making across the organization. Key stakeholders include sales teams, customer service representatives, marketing personnel, and business analysts.

ENTITIES.name: Customer
ENTITIES.description: Core entity containing customer profile information and key business relationships.

fields.name: CustomerID
fields.description: Unique customer identifier used for lookups, order references, and linking customer data across all business systems and processes.

fields.name: CustomerName
fields.description: Official registered name of the customer organization, used for legal and contractual purposes as well as customer communications.

fields.name: CustomerType
fields.description: Categorizes customers based on their business model, size, industry, or other criteria, enabling tailored service offerings and targeted marketing campaigns.

fields.name: PrimaryContact
fields.description: Details of the main point of contact at the customer organization, essential for effective communication and relationship management.

fields.name: SalesRepID
fields.description: Identifier of the sales representative responsible for managing the customer account, facilitating sales activities and ensuring customer satisfaction.

fields.name: CustomerSince
fields.description: Date when the customer relationship was established, useful for analyzing customer lifetime value and targeting loyalty programs.

fields.name: PreferredCommunication
fields.description: Customer's preferred method of communication (e.g., email, phone, mail), enabling more effective and personalized interactions.

ENTITIES.name: Address
ENTITIES.description: Contains physical address information for customer locations and facilities.

fields.name: AddressID
fields.description: Unique identifier for each customer address record, enabling efficient data management and integration with other systems.

fields.name: CustomerID
fields.description: Links the address record to the corresponding customer, allowing for multiple addresses per customer.

fields.name: AddressType
fields.description: Categorizes the address as billing, shipping, headquarters, or other types, ensuring proper handling of communications and deliveries.

fields.name: Street
fields.description: Street name and number of the physical address location.

fields.name: City
fields.description: City where the address is located, used for geographic analysis, logistics planning, and targeted marketing efforts.

fields.name: State
fields.description: State or province where the address is located, important for compliance with regional regulations and tax calculations.

fields.name: PostalCode
fields.description: Postal or ZIP code of the address, facilitating accurate delivery and integration with logistics systems.

fields.name: Country
fields.description: Country where the address is located, crucial for international operations, customs clearance, and localization efforts.

USE_CASES: Show me all customers based in New York City
List the primary contacts for our top 10 customers by revenue
What is the address for customer ABC Corporation's headquarters?
Find customers who became our clients in 2022
Give me the details of customers managed by sales rep John Doe
Display customers preferring email communication for our next marketing campaign
Search for companies classified as 'Enterprise' customers
Retrieve the shipping address for customer XYZ Ltd's Chicago office
Show me customers without an assigned sales representative
List all customer names and their corresponding customer IDs
Find customers located in the state of California
Get me the primary contact information for our oldest active customer
Search for customers based in the UK or Germany
Show customers who signed up for our services before 2018
What is the billing address for Acme Inc.?

PURPOSE: The SalesOrderService handles the entire sales order lifecycle, from order creation and tracking to fulfillment and invoicing.
It manages all data related to customer orders, including order details, product information, pricing, shipping, and payment details.

This service is critical for sales operations, order management, inventory control, and customer service processes. Key stakeholders include sales teams, customer service representatives, warehouse and logistics personnel, and finance teams.

ENTITIES.name: SalesOrder
ENTITIES.description: Represents a customer order for products or services.

fields.name: OrderID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the sales order used for tracking and reference purposes across all systems and processes.

fields.name: CustomerID
fields.description: Unique customer identifier used for lookups, order references, and linking customer data across all business systems and processes.

fields.name: OrderDate
fields.description: The date the customer placed the order, used for tracking order age, prioritization, and meeting service level agreements (SLAs).

fields.name: RequestedDeliveryDate
fields.description: The date the customer expects to receive the order, used for logistics planning, setting customer expectations, and monitoring on-time delivery performance.

fields.name: OrderStatus
fields.description: The current status of the order (e.g., pending, processing, shipped, delivered), used for order tracking, customer updates, and identifying potential issues or delays.

fields.name: TotalAmount
fields.description: The total monetary value of the order, including products, services, taxes, and any applicable discounts or fees. Used for invoicing, revenue recognition, and financial reporting.

fields.name: PaymentMethod
fields.description: The payment method selected by the customer (e.g., credit card, bank transfer, PayPal), used for processing payments and reconciling accounts receivable.

fields.name: ShippingAddress
fields.description: The address where the order should be delivered, used for logistics planning, shipping label generation, and tracking shipments.

ENTITIES.name: OrderItem
ENTITIES.description: Represents an individual product or service included in a sales order.

fields.name: OrderItemID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the order item, used for tracking individual items within an order and linking to product and inventory data.

fields.name: OrderID
fields.description: The identifier of the parent sales order that this item belongs to, used for linking order items to the overall order details.

fields.name: ProductID
fields.description: The identifier of the product or service being ordered, used for linking to product catalogs, inventory levels, and pricing information.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: The number of units of the product or service being ordered, used for inventory management, order fulfillment, and calculating order totals.

fields.name: UnitPrice
fields.description: The price per unit of the product or service, used for calculating order totals, revenue recognition, and profitability analysis.

fields.name: TotalAmount
fields.description: The total monetary value of this order item, calculated as Quantity * UnitPrice, used for order totals, invoicing, and revenue recognition.

fields.name: ItemStatus
fields.description: The current status of this specific order item (e.g., pending, in stock, backordered), used for order tracking, inventory management, and customer updates.

USE_CASES: Show me all open sales orders
What are the details of order #12345?
List orders placed by customer 'ABC Corporation' in the last 30 days
How many orders were shipped last week?
Give me the total revenue from orders in Q1 2023
Find orders with a requested delivery date before June 1st
Show me orders that are delayed or past their expected delivery date
What's the average order value for customers in the 'West' region?
Which products had the highest sales volumes in March?
List all orders paid by credit card
Search for orders containing product 'XYZ'
Update the shipping address for order #98765
Change the status of order item #0011 to 'backordered'
Create a new sales order for customer 'Acme Inc.'
I need to see all orders from our top 10 customers by revenue

PURPOSE: The ProductCatalogService manages all product-related information, inventory levels, and pricing data across the organization.
It handles core business processes such as product lifecycle management, inventory tracking, pricing strategies, and order fulfillment.

This service maintains a centralized repository of product data that is used by various stakeholders including sales, marketing, supply chain, finance, and customer service teams to support their respective operations.

ENTITIES.name: Product
ENTITIES.description: Represents a unique product or stock-keeping unit (SKU) offered by the company.

fields.name: ProductID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the product used for tracking and referencing across all systems and processes.

fields.name: ProductName
fields.description: The commercial name or title of the product as presented to customers and used in marketing materials.

fields.name: ProductDescription
fields.description: Detailed description of the product, including features, specifications, and any additional information to help customers understand its purpose and value proposition.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: The broad product category or classification used for grouping and organizing related products within the catalog.

fields.name: Brand
fields.description: The brand name associated with the product, which can influence customer perception, pricing, and marketing strategies.

fields.name: Manufacturer
fields.description: The company or entity responsible for producing and supplying the product, which can impact sourcing, quality control, and supply chain processes.

fields.name: UnitPrice
fields.description: The base price for a single unit of the product, used for calculating order totals, setting promotional pricing, and analyzing profitability.

fields.name: DiscontinuedDate
fields.description: The date on which the product was discontinued or marked for end-of-life, affecting inventory management and sales strategies.

ENTITIES.name: Inventory
ENTITIES.description: Tracks the current stock levels and availability of products across various locations.

fields.name: ProductID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the product, linking inventory records to the corresponding product information.

fields.name: LocationID
fields.description: Identifier for the specific warehouse, store, or distribution center where the product is stocked.

fields.name: QuantityOnHand
fields.description: The current physical count of units available in the specified location, used for order fulfillment and replenishment planning.

fields.name: ReorderLevel
fields.description: The minimum quantity threshold at which a reorder should be triggered to maintain sufficient stock levels.

fields.name: LeadTime
fields.description: The typical lead time or duration required to receive a new shipment of the product from the supplier or manufacturer.

fields.name: LastStockUpdate
fields.description: The date and time when the inventory levels for this product and location were last updated or synchronized.

fields.name: PreferredVendor
fields.description: The primary or preferred supplier or vendor for replenishing stock of this product, based on factors like cost, lead time, and quality.

ENTITIES.name: PriceList
ENTITIES.description: Maintains pricing information, including base prices, discounts, and special pricing rules for products.

fields.name: ProductID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the product, linking pricing records to the corresponding product information.

fields.name: PriceListID
fields.description: Identifier for a specific price list, which may be associated with customer segments, sales channels, or promotional campaigns.

fields.name: BasePrice
fields.description: The standard or list price for the product, before any discounts or special pricing rules are applied.

fields.name: DiscountPercentage
fields.description: The percentage discount to be applied to the base price, based on factors like customer loyalty, order volume, or promotional offers.

fields.name: EffectiveStartDate
fields.description: The date on which the specified pricing becomes effective, allowing for future price changes to be scheduled and managed.

fields.name: EffectiveEndDate
fields.description: The date on which the specified pricing expires or is no longer valid, facilitating time-limited promotions or seasonal pricing adjustments.

fields.name: PricingRuleID
fields.description: Identifier for any special pricing rules or conditions that should be applied, such as volume discounts, bundle pricing, or customer-specific agreements.

USE_CASES: What products are currently in stock at our main warehouse?
Show me all products under the 'Electronics' category with their descriptions and prices.
I need to find the vendor information for a specific product ID.
How many units of product XYZ do we have available across all locations?
When is the reorder point for product ABC at our Chicago distribution center?
What are the base prices for our top-selling products this quarter?
Give me a list of products that are going to be discontinued in the next 6 months.
I'm looking for products made by 'Acme Corp' that cost less than $50.
Show me inventory levels for all products under the 'Outdoor Gear' brand.
What discounts or promotions are currently active for our 'Premium' customer price list?
I need to find products with 'waterproof' in their description and check availability.
Can you tell me the lead time for replenishing stock of product 123 from our preferred vendor?
Are there any special pricing rules or bundles for our 'Back to School' promotion?
What were our top 10 products by revenue last year, and what are their current prices?
I want to see all products that have been discontinued, along with their discontinuation dates.

_metadata.description: AI-generated OData service metadata for intelligent routing
